name: Deraah Oud Musk & Tofi EDP
description:
A symphony of majestic oriental beauty to raise your status amid your luxurious councils and put your mark on the hearts of those present.
A luxurious blend of amber and rich caramel-flavored candy offers a clear interpretation of the essence of your beauty that captivates the soul in its elegance.
Pure musk clashes with vanilla to envelop the scent in a sensual and attractive touch that suits your romantic occasions and adds a sense of joy to your day.
It is your ideal choice for an appearance that will be admired by all those present and remains sophisticated and renewed by the scent of sandalwood until the last moment.
About the brand:Deraah is a name that surpasses imagination in the world of beauty, perfumes, and men's and women's accessories such as watches, jewelry, and luxury pens. The company has more than 47 years of experience and professionalism, which makes it one of the largest national companies in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Deraah has more than 850 commercial outlets in 162 cities throughout the Kingdom.

Oriental charm inspired by the timeless nature with its breathtaking fragrance.
Embark on an exciting adventure among the vibrant green of fresh basil leaves.
The citrus scent hangs over the air and makes you feel the distinctive spring atmosphere of the eastern lands.
A sparkling combination that gives you absolute vitality and offers you a calm formal look with a bright everyday look.
About the brand:Private is one of 20 other brands owned by Deraah and its products are sold in 37 countries around the world. Link offers a range of fragrance innovations made with unrivaled precision and expertise in collaboration with the world's finest houses of expertise, especially French houses with a clear footprint in the fragrance world.
